articles.title: No More Blurry Images: Your Texts Are Getting an Upgrade
articles.content: Texting between iPhones and Android devices can be miserable.  It brings some familiar “blue bubble” iMessage features to “green bubble” chats with Android phones, such as emoji reactions and read receipts.  Most Americans have iPhones, and iMessage is a big reason people stick with Apple’s devices.
